talks.title: The Future of JavaScript Frameworks
talks.description: A deep dive into the evolving landscape of JavaScript frameworks. We'll explore the latest trends and what to expect in the coming years.

talks.title: Building Scalable APIs with GraphQL
talks.description: Learn how to design and build powerful, scalable APIs using GraphQL. This talk covers best practices and real-world examples.

talks.title: AI-Powered Code Generation
talks.description: Discover how Artificial Intelligence is changing the way we write code. We'll look at the latest AI-powered tools that can boost your productivity.

talks.title: The Art of UI/UX Design
talks.description: A guide to creating beautiful and intuitive user interfaces. This talk will cover the principles of great UI/UX design.

talks.title: Cybersecurity in a Cloud-Native World
talks.description: As applications move to the cloud, security becomes more critical than ever. Learn how to secure your cloud-native applications.

talks.title: WebAssembly: The Next Frontier
talks.description: Explore the power of WebAssembly and how it's enabling near-native performance in web applications. We'll look at use cases and how to get started.
